title: [BUG] I get Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute when publish wasm on windows 10
body:
Hi
When I try to publish my project as a wasm windowsservice with your sample blazor page GPU.razor with skiasharp & skiasharp.views.blazor 2.88.1 I get this error in my browser console
 Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource 'http://localhost:5580/_framework/SkiaSharp.Views.Blazor.dll' with computed SHA-256 integrity 'mnnfdAEuQYbTe9JKRu1rVRILNd37rnaKpjZJE8056T4='. The resource has been blocked.

It works fine in debugmode!

Using
Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - 
Preview
Version 17.4.0 Preview 1.0
